channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Aajoda Testimonials
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Aajoda Testimonials

item.title: CVE-2023-2178|2024-08-02T06:12:20.617Z -- unknown -- aajoda%20testimonials
item.description: The Aajoda Testimonials WordPress plugin before 2.2.2 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
